title: As the Cambridges arrive in Pakistan, here are 17 of the best royal tour looks of all time
text:
Forget Madonna, Ariana Grande and Elton John. This autumn’s real must-watch tours come courtesy of the royals. Tomorrow, the Duke and Duchess of Sussex land in South Africa, and then in a few weeks’ time, the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge jet off to Pakistan. Both visits offer a chance for plenty of soft diplomacy, awareness-raising and, let’s be honest, fashion moments.

And there have been a few of these over the years. From ultra-glamorous state banquets to artful dressing-down, everyone from the Queen onwards has embraced the powerful blend of fashion and photo opportunities to create images which will go down in history.

Here are 17 of the most memorable...

Read more: how the royals pack for an official tour

By Bethan Holt
